title: LF Top, Jungle/ADC and Support For 5v5's!
body:
Looking for a Support and Jungle/ADC ( I will fill the other) and a Top laner!
Gold+ Needs Mic and to be able to play in rest of pre season and season 6!
IGN: iScorpion

replies.body: omg dudeee, I wanna be a in a real ranked team haha with you!!! fk that other team haha, lemme support? :)

Hello, my IGN is Da3littlepigs and I am a support main. I can play all roles, but I prefer Support, then Top and struggle in the jungle. I also love shotcalling and developing with my team. I'm currently in Silver 4 but range from s1-s5, I am quite good at supporting; I only need a good adc. Please consider me as an applicant.{{champion:412}}
I wouldn't mind joining, I play top, jg, support and currently at Gold 5
Would love to join your team as a toplaner
Iscorpion when I get to 30 I can join
